properties.description: Daily from 10am -6pm The warm space is available anytime the centre is open from 10am - 6pm. They run lots of groups throughout the day including a lunch club for over 50's on a Thursday between 12.30 and 2pm. For morew information on the groups please call the centre on 01496 810767 or email Martyn Chandler [email protected]â€‹.
